Text_TC: 留意自己的情緒和身體反應
Text_SC: 留意自己的情绪和身体反应
Text_EN: Pay attention to your emotions and physical reactions

Text_TC: 探索身體哪個部分感受最悲傷
Text_SC: 探索身体哪个部分感受最悲伤
Text_EN: Discover which part of your body feels the saddest

Text_TC: 悲傷是因為我珍視和小A的友情
Text_SC: 悲伤是因为我珍视和小A的友情
Text_EN: Sad because I cherish my friendship with friend A
It's not wrong to be sad

Text_TC: 檢查自己是否有絕對化的思維
Text_SC: 检查自己是否有绝对化的思维
Text_EN: Check whether you have absolute thinking

Text_TC: 分析自己對這件事的詮釋
Text_SC: 分析自己对这件事的诠释
Text_EN: Analyze your own interpretation of this matter

Text_TC: 檢查自己有沒有災難性的想法
Text_SC: 检查自己有没有灾难性的想法

Text_TC: 反思自己有沒有過度反應
Text_SC: 反思自己有没有过度反应
Text_EN: Reflect on whether you have overreacted

Text_TC: 我們不一起上學，同時可以繼續見面
Text_SC: 我们不一起上学，同时可以继续见面
Text_EN: We don't go to school together, but we can continue to see each other

Text_TC: 我們還有其他方式維持友情
Text_SC: 我们还有其他方式维持友情
Text_EN: There are other ways we can maintain friendship
Express your sadness to friend A
Make an appointment to meet on the weekend

Text_TC: 告訴自己傷心是不對的
Text_SC: 告诉自己伤心是不对的
Text_EN: Tell yourself it's wrong to be sad
Other friends will leave me too
I can never see my friends again
Insisting that I also want to transfer schools
Don't want to make friends anymore

Text_TC: 責怪自己花了太久傷心
Text_SC: 责怪自己花了太久伤心
Text_EN: Blaming myself for taking too long to be sad

Text_TC: 深呼吸幾次讓自己冷靜下來
Text_SC: 深呼吸几次让自己冷静下来
Text_EN: Take a few deep breaths to calm yourself down

Text_TC: 洗個冷水臉讓自己平靜下來
Text_SC: 洗个冷水脸让自己平静下来
Text_EN: Wash your face with cold water to calm yourself down

Text_TC: 思考一下自己行動的目標
Text_SC: 思考一下自己行动的目标
Text_EN: Think about the goals of your actions

Text_TC: 不評判憤怒的感覺對錯與否
Text_SC: 不评判愤怒的感觉对错与否
Text_EN: Don’t judge whether angry feelings are right or wrong

Text_TC: 感受一下憤怒在身體上的反應
Text_SC: 感受一下愤怒在身体上的反应
Text_EN: Feel the physical reaction of anger

Text_TC: 探索身體最能感受憤怒的地方
Text_SC: 探索身体最能感受愤怒的地方
Text_EN: Explore where anger is most felt in the body
Think about the demands behind the anger

Text_TC: 我不需要破壞性行為來發洩
Text_SC: 我不需要破坏性行为来发泄
Text_EN: I don't need destructive behavior to vent

Text_TC: 別人這麼傷害我是不對的
Text_SC: 别人这么伤害我是不对的
Text_EN: It's wrong for others to hurt me like this

Text_TC: 檢查一下有沒有災難化的想像
Text_SC: 检查一下有没有灾难化的想象

Text_TC: 檢查一下有沒有絕對化的思維
Text_SC: 检查一下有没有绝对化的思维
Text_EN: Check whether you have absolute thinking
Have a nice hot pot meal
Eat an ice cream to calm down
Make yourself a cup of coffee

Text_TC: 想想怎麼保護好自己的權益
Text_SC: 想想怎么保护好自己的权益
Text_EN: Think about how to protect your rights and interests

Text_TC: 非暴力地向小A表達自己的憤怒
Text_SC: 非暴力地向小A表达自己的愤怒
Text_EN: Express your anger to classmate A non-violently
Think about how to solve the problem
Spreading rumors about classmate A everywhere
Tell yourself not to be angry

Text_TC: 告訴自己生氣是不成熟的表現
Text_SC: 告诉自己生气是不成熟的表现
Text_EN: Tell yourself that getting angry is immature

Text_TC: 告訴自己生氣就是輸了
Text_SC: 告诉自己生气就是输了
Text_EN: Tell yourself that you have lost when you are angry
Drink 5 cans of beer in a row

Text_TC: 怨恨朋友沒及時告訴自己
Text_SC: 怨恨朋友没及时告诉自己
Text_EN: I resent my friend for not telling me in time
Be patient and it will pass

Text_TC: 告訴自己做什麼都是沒用的
Text_SC: 告诉自己做什么都是没用的
Text_EN: Tell yourself that whatever you do is useless

Text_TC: 深呼吸幾次讓自己冷靜下來
Text_SC: 深呼吸几次让自己冷静下来
Text_EN: Take a few deep breaths to calm yourself down

Text_TC: 每個人都可能遇到這樣的事
Text_SC: 每个人都可能遇到这样的事

Text_EN: this is not the end of the world

Text_TC: 檢查一下有沒有災難化的想像
Text_SC: 检查一下有没有灾难化的想象

Text_EN: List ways to solve the problem

Text_TC: 認清犯錯和自己能力無關
Text_SC: 认清犯错和自己能力无关
Text_EN: Understand that making mistakes has nothing to do with your ability

Text_TC: 以溫和的態度和朋友協商
Text_SC: 以温和的态度和朋友协商
Text_EN: Negotiate with friends in a gentle manner

Text_TC: 責怪朋友把衣服給自己
Text_SC: 责怪朋友把衣服给自己
Text_EN: Blaming friends for giving them clothes
My friends will definitely break up with me
Complaining about being unlucky all the time
Think you don't deserve to live
Have a fight with a friend

Text_TC: 覺得這件事不可能被解決
Text_SC: 觉得这件事不可能被解决
Text_EN: I feel like this matter can't be solved
Take deep breaths to calm down

Text_TC: 客觀地觀察周圍人的反應
Text_SC: 客观地观察周围人的反应
Text_EN: Objectively observe the reactions of those around you

Text_TC: 想一想這個當下最重要的是什麼
Text_SC: 想一想这个当下最重要的是什么
Text_EN: Think about what is most important right now

Text_TC: 想一想自己最在乎的是什麼
Text_SC: 想一想自己最在乎的是什么
Text_EN: Think about what you care about most

Text_TC: 檢查自己是否有誇大的詮釋
Text_SC: 检查自己是否有夸大的诠释

Text_TC: 檢查一下有沒有災難化想法
Text_SC: 检查一下有没有灾难化想法

Text_TC: 想想真的不可以跟別人穿得不一樣嗎
Text_SC: 想想真的不可以跟别人穿得不一样吗
Text_EN: Think about it, can’t you really dress differently from others?

Text_TC: 穿得不一樣和享受聚會可以共存
Text_SC: 穿得不一样和享受聚会可以共存
Text_EN: Dressing differently and enjoying parties can coexist

Text_TC: 想想當下有沒有其他選擇
Text_SC: 想想当下有没有其他选择
Text_EN: Think about whether there are other options at the moment

Text_TC: 享受派對中喜歡的環節
Text_SC: 享受派对中喜欢的环节
Text_EN: Enjoy your favorite parts of the party
Show what you are good at

Text_TC: 埋怨他人沒有提醒自己
Text_SC: 埋怨他人没有提醒自己
Text_EN: Blame others for not reminding themselves
Keep asking others for their opinions
Leave the party on the spot

Text_TC: 不評判地觀察小A的反應
Text_SC: 不评判地观察小A的反应
Text_EN: Observe friend A’s reaction without judging
You should be happy if you pass the exam

Text_TC: 思考一下自己最重視的是什麼
Text_SC: 思考一下自己最重视的是什么
Text_EN: Think about what you value most

Text_TC: 思考一下當下最重要的是什麼
Text_SC: 思考一下当下最重要的是什么
Text_EN: Think about what is most important right now
Think about the consequences of your actions
Don’t do anything irrelevant to the purpose
Avoid looking down on friend A
Feel like I shouldn't be happy
I feel like I’m not a good friend
Think friend A has accomplished nothing
